summary: Shivshankar, a wheelchair-bound man, tries to make his son Vishnu aware of his responsibilities but to no avail. Things take a turn for the worse after Vishnu starts stealing and tries to rape a girl.
cast: Ajith Kumar|Asin Thottumkal|Kaniha|Vijayan|Mansoor Ali Khan|Ponnambalam|Ramesh Khanna|Pandu|Santhana Bharathi|Manobala|Suman Shetty|Sujatha|Rajyalakshmi|Shivashankar|Chitti Babu|Madhan Bob
title: Varalaaru
